segments.text: Where are you feeling the pain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t stand up ! My stomach is killing me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you put your hand where it hurts the most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It hurts smack in the middle of my gut !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did this just come on suddenly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I felt OK until an hour or so ago , and then I just doubled over .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you exercised strenuously or played sports recently ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , and I don ’ t usually get a lot of stomachaches .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need to get you to an emergency room to see what the problem is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that that is the best way to figure out what is causing this . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
